info.title: enfore Contacts API
info.description:
enfore API for managing contacts (incl. customers, suppliers and staff)

Contacts are entities that the organization has dealings with.
Contacts can be split into individual contacts (i.e., human persons) and organization contacts (i.e., other organizations/businesses).
Additionally, contacts can have roles such as being a supplier, a customer, or a staff member. A single contact can have multiple roles, for example staff members are often also customers.

tags.name: individual_contacts
tags.description: Individual contacts are private persons that the organization has dealings with.

tags.name: organization_contacts
tags.description: Organization contacts are businesses and other organizations that the organization has dealings with.

id.description:
The technical identifier of the contact. Assigned by the enfore platform on creation of the
contact and not changeable afterwards.

name.description:
The name of the contact.
For individual contacts, this is the full name of the person, e.g., "Barnabas Ludwig Johnson II Sr.".
For organization contacts, this is the "common name" of the organization. This may not necessarily be the registered business name, as that may either not exist or be too cumbersome to use.

IndividualContactWithSubresources.description: An IndividualContact including all subresources such addresses, emails and phones.

founders.description:
The founders of the organization.
The array contains the URIs for accessing the professional identities of the founders of the organization.

leaders.description:
The leaders of the organization.
The array contains the URIs for accessing the professional identities of the leaders of the organization.

OrganizationContactWithSubresources.description: An OrganizationContact including all subresources such addresses, emails and phones.

organization_contact.description: The URI of the OrganizationContact that the IndividualContact owning the ProfessionalIdentity represents.

departments.description:
The departments of the represented organization that the person works at.
The items of the array are references to Department items that belong to the OrganizationContact referenced by the PIs "organization_contact" field.

locations.description:
The locations of the represented organization that the person works at.
The items of the array are references to Location items that belong to the OrganizationContact referenced by the PIs "organization_contact" field.

ProfessionalIdentity.description: A professional identity represents that an individual contact represents (e.g., works for) an organization.

ProfessionalIdentityWithSubresources.description: A ProfessionalIdentity including all subresources such addresses, emails and phones.

individual_contact.description: The URI of the IndividualContact that the IndividualContact owning the PersonalRelationship has a relationship with.

PersonalRelationship.description: A personal relationship represents a relationship that an individual contact has with another individual.

PersonalRelationshipType.description: The type of a personal relationship

DepartmentArea.description: The area of activity of a department

leaders.description:
The leaders of the location.
The array contains the URIs for accessing the professional identities of the leaders of the location.

LocationWithSubresources.description: A Location including all subresources such addresses, emails and phones.

organization_contact.description: The URI of the OrganizationContact that the contact owning the Membership is a member of.

full_address.description: The full address as a string suitable for display to an end user.

Gender.description: The gender of a human person
